no.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
no.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
no.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
no.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
no.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
no.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
no.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
no.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
no.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
no.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
no.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
no.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
no.country_code_message: Sett landskoden til der denne enheten er. Dette brukes på værvarsler
no.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
no.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
no.end_port_invalid: Sluttporten er ugyldig. Den må være mellom 1 og 65535.
no.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
no.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
no.home_pin_message: Konfigurasjonskoden brukes når du legger til Homebridge i Apple Hjem-appen
no.home_username_message: Brukernavnet Apple Home bruker for å identifisere Homebridge.
no.homekit_disconnect: Dette vil koble Homebridge fra Apple Home. Du må re-pair.
no.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
no.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
no.invalid_port_range: Ugyldig portområde. Sluttporten må være større enn startporten.
no.language_message: Velg språk for brukergrensesnittet, eller velg auto for å bruke nettleserens språkinnstillinger.
no.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
no.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
no.name: Navn
no.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
no.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
no.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
no.postal_code_message: Sett postnummer til der denne enheten er. Dette brukes på værvarsler
no.range_name_message: En beskrivelse av portområdet som brukes til å identifisere portområdet.
no.save_validation: Vær vennlig å utbedre følgende feil.
no.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
no.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
no.service_description_message: Brukes sammen med navnet for å identifisere Homebridge.
no.service_name_message: Brukes til å identifisere Homebridge-tjenesten på systemet.
no.service_port_invalid: Tjenesteporten er ugyldig. Den må være et tall mellom 1 og 65535.
no.service_port_message: Porten Homebridge kjører på, standardporten er 51826.
no.start_port_invalid: Startporten er ugyldig. Det må være et tall mellom 1 og 65535.
